name: ASIDE.IO
description: A Salesforce IDE - fast, free, and open source

SEC.description: Salesforce connected app client secret.  This must be populated before OAuth will work, but is not required to deploy ASIDE.

CID.description: Salesforce connected app client id.  This must be populated before OAuth will work, but is not required to deploy ASIDE.

URL.description: URL of where the instance of ASIDE will be hosted (E.g. https://www.aside.io).  This must be populated before OAuth will work, but is not required to deploy ASIDE.
